markdownRemark.html:
Hi Everyone,

Before starting to my first blog post, I want to start with who I am and I will continue with why I am starting a new blog and what will I share in this blog.

Let’s start with who I am.

Who I Am?

I am Mutluhan ÜZMEZ and I am studying computer engineering in ITU. It’s my last year in the university. I was born in Eskişehir, moved around in Turkey because of my parents’s work and after I got into university, I started to live in Istanbul. After starting to my university, I always tried to improve myself in the software field. I joined the ITUNOM team in my first year of university. As a team, we participated in the AUVSI SUAS competition, which is the best known competition for students in the field of unmanned aerial systems in Maryland, USA. After 2 years work in ITUNOM team, I started to work in a startup which develops IOT systems for agriculture. I worked here part-time as mobile application developer for approximately 1 year and I resigned after a year in order to focus more to the school. After couple months without responsibilities except school, I decided to start a blog.

Why I am starting a blog?

There are 3 main reasons to start this blog for me.

1- Reminders! I don’t want to forget any work I do, even small things.

The most important reason for starting a blog is this in my perspective because when I try to do a work which is similar or same work which is I have done before, sometimes I can not remember and start from nothing again and again. While I am updating my CV, in the skills section I am hesitating for writing some skills which I earned before because the passing time makes you forget them and these kind of old skills can cause problems in interviews. So in order to don’t forget any skill or even I forget to remember easily, I want to collect my all work in well-documented reports and do this in blog post format.

frontmatter.title: Why I Am Starting A Blog?
frontmatter.description: Hi Everyone, In this post I will mention about why I am starting a blog. It will be my first blog post and I am hoping that you can find reasons for yourself to starting a blog.
